prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
Thanks for joining our live coverage on an extraordinary day in court, with adult-film star Stormy Daniels taking the stand.

It was a tense courtroom, with Daniels warned to dial back her comments at times. Prosecutors were also told to limit their questions regarding the salacious details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump (which Trump has denied ever took place).

Here's our full wrap of what happened in court today.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay and Phil McCausland. The writers were Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, and we had Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein in court.

Court doesn't sit on Wednesday, so we'll be back on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will once again take to the stand to continue her testimony.
stories:
We appreciate you tuning in to our live updates on a dramatic day in court, where adult film star Stormy Daniels testified.

The courtroom atmosphere was tense, with Daniels occasionally cautioned to restrain her remarks. Prosecutors were also advised to curb their questioning about the explicit details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump, which Trump has consistently denied.

Find our comprehensive summary of today's court proceedings here.

This page was curated by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland. Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon wrote the content, with Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein reporting live from the courtroom.

Since the court is not in session on Wednesday, we'll resume our coverage on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will continue her testimony.

We're grateful for your attention to our live coverage of a dramatic day in court, where adult film star Stormy Daniels took the stand.

The mood in the courtroom was strained, with Daniels occasionally warned to temper her comments. Meanwhile, prosecutors were also instructed to limit their inquiry into the explicit aspects of her alleged affair with Trump, which the latter has repeatedly denied.

You can find a thorough recap of today's courtroom events here.

This page was compiled by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland, with Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon providing the content. Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein contributed live reports from the courtroom.

As the court is adjourned until Thursday, we'll pick up our coverage then, when Stormy Daniels will resume her testimony.
